CustomField.description: Monthly Recurring Revenue at the time of Tier Upsell Opportunity Creation. This field will calculate based off of (# of Active Employees x (N) + # of Active Contractors x (N) + Company Product x 1 + Discount) and will not update once populated on the Tier Upsell Opportunity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Monthly Recurring Revenue at the time of Tier Upsell Opportunity Creation. This field will calculate based off of (# of Active Employees x (N) + # of Active Contractors x (N) + Company Product x 1 + Discount) and will not update once populated on the Tier Upsell Opportunity.
CustomField.label: Orignal MRR
